long_description: The Nike LunarEclipse 4 Road-Running Shoes are exceptionally flexible and lightweight, featuring Dynamic Fit technology with Flywire for a secure fit and strategic support on your runs. Engineered mesh uppers deliver ventilation with targeted support, and molded blades and flex grooves help you move naturally. Dynamic Fit system with Flywire thin nylon fibers that are strategically placed to wrap the midfeet and arches for a glovelike fit. Include ultra-lightweight, springy Lunarlon cushioning for soft yet responsive shock absorption. Mesh midfoot panels with no-sew overlays for seamless comfort and increased ventilation. Rubber outsoles for optimal traction and durability with reduced weight. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light.
short_description: The Nike LunarEclipse 4 Road-Running Shoes are exceptionally flexible and lightweight, featuring Dynamic Fit technology with Flywire for a secure fit and strategic support on your runs.
